author: patanachai
msg: Fix test error and move working directory to target folder.

author: marvin
msg: Provide a core implementation of StrHelp_utf8_valid() rather than relying on
the Perl C API function is_utf8_string().  This implementation tightens the
requirements and passes only truly valid UTF-8, forbidding UTF-8-encoded
UTF-16 surrogates and code points above 0x10FFFF.

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-3418: fsync files during commit so on crash/power loss we don't corrumpt the index
